decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (S/498/01, 02, 03, location plan, received 12/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The proposed development shall not be implemented in conjunction with either the six-metre deep single storey rear extension referred to under planning decision 01213/14/PA1 dated 07/03/2016 or the hip to gable conversion with rear roof extension referred to under planning decision 01213/14/LAW1 dated 22/09/2015 and if either of these is built, the extension hereby approved shall not be implemented subsequently
description: Erection of a two storey rear extension to the house
